mapper.sql: SALARY_ID, YEAR, MONTH, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, STAFF_ID, STATUS
mapper.insert: insert into salary_table (SALARY_ID, YEAR, MONTH, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIED_TIME, STAFF_ID, STATUS) values (#{salaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into salary_table
SALARY_ID,
YEAR,
MONTH,

mapper.update:
update salary_table
YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler},
MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler},
STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
where SALARY_ID = #{salaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update salary_table set YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, MODIFIED_TIME = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.LocalDateTimeTypeHandler}, STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where SALARY_ID = #{salaryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
